WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed. Trinket text was reworded in 3.2, so I fixed the parsing of it.
WorkItem.Description:
Using Rawr 2.2.12
Spark of Hope is only showing the 100 Spirit bonus.
There is no mana reduction ability shown in the tooltip or calculations. 
Refreshing the item data from the armory or Wowhead yields no change. 
Â 
I have tried editing the item, but I'm not really sure how to duplicate the equip bonus with the given tools. 
Considering constant casting with standard 1.5 seconds GCD, equip bonus on this trinket should be equal to 140 mp5. 
Would this be an adequate workaround?
